# CAM::SET_CAM_CONTROLS_MINI_MAP_HEADING

## Summary
Sets whether the heading of the specified script-controlled camera (when rendered) can influence the orientation of the mini-map

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** camera
* **BOOL** state

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Rotates the radar to match the camera's Z rotation
